docs.title: Services
docs.text:
Hazenberg IT is providing B2B services

  • Software implementation projects: A-Z implementation projects, from high/low-level design to implementation, to ops. Greenfield, Brownfield, migrations, etc.
  • Customer success: to act as a link between customer and product/service team, consulting, coordination
  • DevOps: Development services in languages such as Scala, Python, or Golang. Focussed on backend, using common practices like IaC and/or GitOps.
  • Automation services: Automate deployments and release pipelines, Kubernetes, hosting -- linux based
  • Training: knowledge sharing is part of any project, to develop content or provide training.

Feel free to contact us.
